content.text:
HON. TODD ROKITA

                               of indiana

                    in the house of representatives

                      Wednesday, November 1, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Mr. ROKITA. Mr. Speaker, I was unable to vote on October 31, 2017 as 
my flight to Washington D.C. was delayed and prevented me from being on 
the House floor in time.
  Had I been present, I would have voted YEA on Roll Call No. 591.
content.speaker: Mr. ROKITA
